S06sspp2_4u:2: atha khalu śakro devāṇām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:3_0: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac ceyaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhṇanto
S06sspp2_4u:3_1: dhārayanto vācayantaḥ paryavāpnuvanto yoniśaś ca manasikurvanta iha dhārmikān guṇān
S06sspp2_4u:5_0: buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsīnāḥ yaiś ca kuśalamūlair ākāṅkṣanti tān buddhān bhagavataḥ
S06sspp2_4u:5_1: satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayituṃ tān yeṣāṃ kuśalamūlāni samṛdhyanti yac ca
S06sspp2_4u:5_2: teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇvati sa tāvan na vipramuṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:9: janmasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti parivārasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti,
S06sspp2_4u:11_0: cakṣuḥsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti svarasaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti samādhisaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti
S06sspp2_4u:11_1: dhāraṇīsaṃpadaṃ ca parigṛhṇanti upāyakauśalyena cātmānaṃ buddhavigraham abhinirmāya
S06sspp2_4u:12: yatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anutpādaḥ prādurbhāvo nāsti,
S06sspp2_4u:13: te tatra gatvā dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
S06sspp2_4u:59: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣante. upāyakauśalyena ca sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayanti triṣu ca yāneṣu sattvān vinayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:61: atha śakro devānām indraḥ punar bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:62: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvac cedaṃ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.
S06sspp2_4u:111: evam ukte bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:113: prajñāpāramitayā kauśika parigṛhītayā sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti.
S06sspp2_4u:163: punar aparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītayā dhārayitayā vācitayā paryavāptayā yoniśaś ca manasikṛtayā yāṅ guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭidhārmikān parigṛhṇāti,
S06sspp2_4u:164: tāṃc chṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:165: evaṃ bhagavann iti śakro devānām indro bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:167_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika anyatīrthikacarakaparivrājako māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā adhimānikā
S06sspp2_4u:167_1: vā pudgalā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vigrahītukāmā bhaviṣyanti vivecayitukamā bhaviṣyanti
S06sspp2_4u:167_2: vivaditukāmā bhaviṣyanti virodhayitukāmā bhaviṣyanti teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivecayitukamānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:168: teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivecayitukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ te 'bhiprāyā na paripūrayiṣyanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:169_0: tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dīrgharātraṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:169_1: caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā
S06sspp2_4u:170: yeṣāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādān āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:171: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvā dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:172: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauḥśīlyam āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:173: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvāḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:174: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ krodhavyāpādavihiṃsā āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:175: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān [ŚsP_II-4_5] dharmān parityajyate sattvāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:176: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ kausīdyam āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:177: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate sattvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:178: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ vikṣepam āpadyate,
S06sspp2_4u:179: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate satttvā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:180: yeṣāṃ kṛte sattvā dīrgharātraṃ dauṣprajñām āpadyante,
S06sspp2_4u:181: tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenādhyātmikabāhyān dharmān parityajyate satttvāḥ prajñānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:182: yeṣāṃ kṛte kauśika sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsāranti yad utānuśayaparyutthāne na tān bodhisattvena mahāsattvenopāyakauśalena,
S06sspp2_4u:183_0: teṣāṃ sattvānām anuśayaparyutthānaṃ vigṛhyate sattvāś caturṣu dhyāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāś
S06sspp2_4u:183_1: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu samādāpitāś catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpitā pañcasv abhijñāsu
S06sspp2_4u:183_2: samādāpitāḥ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu amādāpitāś caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu samādāpitāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:183_3: caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu samāpitāḥ pañcasv indriyeṣu samādāpitāḥ pañcasu baleṣu samādāpitāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:183_4: saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu samādāpitāḥ āryāṣṭāṅge mārge samādāpitāś caturṣv āryasatyeṣu samādāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:184: navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ sarvasamādhiṣu samādāpitāḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu samādāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:185: daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu samādāpitāḥ caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:195: ime te kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ caratā dṛṣṭadhārmikā na guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:196: saṃparāye cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvānyathāpratiṣṭhāne pratiṣṭhāpyānupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyati.
S06sspp2_4u:197: ime kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sāṃparāyikā guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:199_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06sspp2_4u:199_1: udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati [ŚsP_II-4_6] yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:200_0: na tatra pṛthivīpradeśe māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā anyatīrthikā vā parivrājakā
S06sspp2_4u:200_1: ādhimānika vā pudgalāḥ śakṣyanty asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vigrahāya vā vivādāya vā
S06sspp2_4u:200_2: virodhāya vāntardhānāya vā parākramitum uttare ca teṣāṃ guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:200_3: yadāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇagrahaṇabhāvanābhir anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāya
S06sspp2_4u:201_0: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika maghinām auṣadhīḥ sarvaviṣapraśamaṇī tatrāśīviṣeṇa vā jantunā
S06sspp2_4u:201_1: vā kṣudhābhibhūtenāhārānveṣiṇā kiṃcid eva prāṇijātaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavet. sa tat prāṇakajātaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:201_2: khāditukāmatayānugacchet. atha tat prāṇakajātaṃ maraṇabhayabhītaṃ yena sā maghī nām'
S06sspp2_4u:201_3: auṣadhis tenopasaṃkrāman tataḥ sa āśīviṣas tasyā auṣadhyā gandhenaiva pratyudāvartitavyaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:202: tathā hi tasyā auṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇo yaṃ tasyāśīviṣasya tad viṣam abhibhavaty eva balavatī hi kauśika sā maghī auṣadhiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:203: evam eva kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:204: tatra kauśika ya utpannotpannā vigrahavivādavirodhā bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:205: te prajñāpāramitāyās tejasā prajñāpāramitāyā balena kṣipram evāntardhāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:209: tathā hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarveṣāṃ pāpakānāṃ dharmāṇām upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā yad uta rāgadveṣamohāṇām upaśamayitrī na vivardhikā.
S06sspp2_4u:223: yāvat kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasyopaśamayitri na vivardhikā,
S06sspp2_4u:314: eteṣāṃ kauśika sarvesāṃ mārakāyikānāṃ dharmāṇām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitopaśamayitrī na vivardhikā,
S06sspp2_4u:315_0: yāvanta kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraś ca devānām
S06sspp2_4u:315_1: indro brahmānaś ca sahāpatiḥ ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhatphalā devāḥ śuddhāvāso devāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:316: te sarve tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:317: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:319: sa punar akuśalebhayaś ca dharmebhyaḥ parihāsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:321: yad uta dānapāramitayā vivardhiṣyate na parihāsyate 'nupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:372: sa ādeyavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati mitavacanas ca bhaviṣyati na ca vikīrṇavacano bhaviṣyati na krodhābhibhūto bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:382: parāṃś cādattādānavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati. adattādānavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:385: ātmanā ca kāmamithyācārāt prativirato bhaviṣyati. parāṃś ca kāmamithyācāravairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati kāmamithyācāraviramaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:388: ātmanā ca mṛṣāvādāt prativirato bhaviṣyati. parāṃś ca mṛṣāvādavairamaṇyāṃ samādāpayiṣyati mṛṣāvādavairamaṇyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:454: ye cānye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:458: ye cānye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:462: ye cānye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:466: ye cānye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:470: ye cānye mahāśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:474: ye cānye paramārthaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:478: ye cānye saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:482: ye cānye 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:486: ye cānye 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:490: ye cānye 'navarāgraśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:494: ye cānye 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:498: ye cānye prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:502: ye cānye sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:506: ye cānye svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādi bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:510: ye cānye 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:514: ye cānye 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:518: ye cānye svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:522: ye cānye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:524: ātmanā ca sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyate parāṃś ca sarvasamādhisamāpattau samādāpayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:526: ye cānye sarvasamādhīn samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:530: ye cānye dhāraṇīpratilambhā bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:534: ye cānye prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:538: ye cānye dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:542: ye cānye tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:546: ye cānye caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:550: ye cānye mahāmaitrī samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:554: ye cānye karuṇā samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:558: ye cānye muditāṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:562: ye cānye upekṣāṃ samāpatsyate teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:566: ye cānye ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:570: ye cānye vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:574: ye cānye ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati [ŚsP_II-4_15] samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:578: ye cānye naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpatsyante teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:582: ye cānye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:586: ye cānye samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:590: ye cānye ṛddhipādān bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:594: ye cānye pañcendriyāṇi bhāvayiṣyanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhaviṣyati samanujñaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:665: ātmanā ca mārgākārajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyati, parāṃś ca
S06sspp2_4u:676: sa ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran yad dānaṃ dāsyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:677: yac chīlaṃ rakṣiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:678: yāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:679: yad vīryaṃ ārapsyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:680: yad dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:681: yāṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayiṣyati tat sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayiṣyaty anupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:682: evaṃ carataḥ kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu smṛtir utpatsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:683: saced dānaṃ na dāsyāmi durgateṣu kuleṣūpapatsya na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:684: sacet chīlaṃ na rakṣiṣyāmi tisṛṣu me durgatīṣūpapattir bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:686: na sattvaparipāko na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñatāṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:688: indriyāṇi me paribhetsyate mukhamaṇḍalaṃ me dhyāmībhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:690_0: yayā rūpasaṃpadayā bodhisattvacārikāḥ carataḥ sattvasahadarśane naiva niyatā bhaviṣyanty
S06sspp2_4u:690_1: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na ca rūpasaṃpadā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na buddhakṣetraṃ
S06sspp2_4u:691: sacet kusīdo bhaviṣyati nemaṃ śakṣyāmi bodhimārgam anuprāptaṃ na ca me sattvaparipāko bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:692: na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanaṃ na sarvākārajñataṃ pratilapsye,
S06sspp2_4u:693: saced vikṣiptacitto bhaviṣyāmi nedaṃ śaksyāmi samādhim utpādayituṃ yena samādhinā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi na me buddhakṣetrapariśodhanaṃ bhaviṣyāmi na sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsye,
S06sspp2_4u:694_0: saced [ŚsP_II-4_18] duṣprajño bhaviṣyāmi na śakṣyāmi prajñopāyakauśalena śrāvakabhūmipratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ
S06sspp2_4u:694_1: cātikramya sattvān paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:696_0: ayuktam etad bhaved yo māṃ mātsaryavaśena dānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauḥśīlyavaśena
S06sspp2_4u:696_1: śīlapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vyāpadavaśena kṣāntipāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ kauśīdyavaśena
S06sspp2_4u:696_2: vīryapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ vikṣepavaśena dhyānapāramitāṃ na paripūrayeyaṃ dauṣprajñāvaśena
S06sspp2_4u:697: aparipūrayan dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyāmi sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:698: evaṃ khalu kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikāṃś ca sāṃparāyikāṃś ca guṇānuśaṃsān pratilapsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:699: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:702: śakra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
S06sspp2_4u:704: yathā punaḥ kauśika bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāparidamanārthāyānunnamārthāya ca pratyupasthitā.
S06sspp2_4u:705: śakra āha: iha bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ śrāvakebhyaś ca dānaṃ dadāti,
S06sspp2_4u:706_0: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:706_1: śrāvakebhyaś ca sa kṛpaṇavanīyakārthena yācanakebhyaś ca sa tena dānenānupāyakauśalenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:708: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:710: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:712: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:713: laukikyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ. evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi sa tenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:715: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayāmi ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:718: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:720: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:722: evaṃ bhavaty aham ṛddhipādān bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:724: evaṃ bhavaty aham indriyāṇi bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:726: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ balāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:728: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:730: evaṃ bhavaty aham āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:732: evaṃ bhavaty aham āryasatyāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:734: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:736: evaṃ bhavaty aham apramāṇāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:738: evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattir bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:740: evaṃ bhavaty aham ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:742: evaṃ bhavaty aham anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:744: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:746: evaṃ bhavaty aham abhijñāṃ bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:748: evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ samādhīn bhāvayāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniveśenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
S06sspp2_4u:749: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvadhāraṇīḥ pratilapsye sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:750: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ daśatathāgatabalāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:751: tasyaivaṃ [ŚsP_II-4_20] bhavaty ahaṃ catvāri vaiśāradyāni bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:752: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidā bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:753: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ mahākaruṇāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:754: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty aham aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:755: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:756: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:757: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmi sa tenāhaṃkārābhiniviśenonnāmaṃ gacchati.
S06sspp2_4u:758_0: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo laukikeṣu dharmeṣu caran unnāmaṃ gacchaty
S06sspp2_4u:758_1: ahaṃkārābhiniveśena tasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāya nānunnāmārthāya pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:760_0: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lokottarāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvān
S06sspp2_4u:760_1: na dāyakam upalabhate na dānam upalabhate na pratigrāhakam upalabhate. evaṃ khalu
S06sspp2_4u:760_2: bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya
S06sspp2_4u:761_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāc chīlaṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_4u:761_1: śīlaṃ nopalabhyate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:761_2: carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:762_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_4u:762_1: kṣāntiṃ nopalabhyate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:762_2: carataḥ prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:763_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvād vīryaṃ nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_4u:763_1: vīryavaṃ taṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:764_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitā subhāvitatvād dhyānaṃ nopalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:764_1: dhyānaṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan [ŚsP_II-4_21] bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S06sspp2_4u:765_0: sa lokottarāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt prajñāṃ nopalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:765_1: prajñāṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:765_2: carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya ca pratyupasthitā bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:766: sa smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:767: sa samyakprahāṇāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:768: sa ṛddhipādān bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:769: sa indriyāṇi bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:770: sa balāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:771: sa bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:772: sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:773_0: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya
S06sspp2_4u:773_1: ca pratyupasthitā bhavati. sa āryasatyāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:774: sa dhyānāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:776: sa ārūpyasamāpattīr bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:777: sa vimokṣā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsu bhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:779: sa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:781: sa samādhīn bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:782_0: sa dhāraṇīmukhāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt. evaṃ khalu
S06sspp2_4u:783: sa tathāgatabalāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:784: sa vaiśāradyāni bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:785: sa pratisaṃvido bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:786: sa mahāmaitrīṃ bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:787: sa mahākaruṇā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:788_0: sa āveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt. [ŚsP_II-4_22]
S06sspp2_4u:788_1: evaṃ khalu bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyā prajñāpāramitā paridamanārthāyānunnāmārthāya
S06sspp2_4u:789: sa sarvajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:790: sa mārgākārajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt,
S06sspp2_4u:791_0: sa sarvākārajñatā bhāvayati na copalabhate prajñāpāramitāsubhāvitatvāt. evaṃ khalu
S06sspp2_4u:795: atha khalu bhagavāñ chakro devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:796: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati svādhyāpayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:799: tatra sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyann avataret,
S06sspp2_4u:800: tatrāvatīrya tiṣṭheta nāsau kulaputro vā kuladuhitā yā parājayaṃ yāsyati,
S06sspp2_4u:801: jaya evāsya bhaviṣyaty akṣataś cānupahataś ca taṃ saṃgrāmam uttariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:802: asthānaṃ kauśikānavakāśo yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyaṃs tatra saṃgrāme samabhirūḍho jīvitāntarāyaṃ nigacchen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06sspp2_4u:803: sacet punar asya kaścid eva śastraṃ vā kāṇḍaṃ vā śarīre kṣipet na tasya śarīre patiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:804: tathā hi tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā dīrgharātraṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā,
S06sspp2_4u:805: ātmanaś ca rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāni nirjitāni pareṣāṃ rāgaśastrāṇi rāgakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:806: ātmanaś ca dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ dveṣaśastrāṇi dveṣakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:807: ātmanaś ca mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ mohaśastrāṇi mohakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:808: ātmanaś ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca dṛṣṭikṛtaśastrāṇi dṛṣṭikṛtakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:809: ātmanaś ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ ca paryutthānaśastrāṇi paryutthānakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:810: ātmanaś cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāṇi nirjitāni pareṣāṃ cānuśayaśastrāṇy anuśayakāṇḍāni nirjitāni,
S06sspp2_4u:811: imām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya tāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatāṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:812: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā saṃgrāmamadhyagatasya śastrāṇi vā kāṇḍāni vā kṣiptāni śarīre na nipatiṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:813: punar aparaṃ kauśika sacet kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:814: sarvajñatācittena cāvirahito bhaviṣyati. tasya kaścid abhaiṣajyam avakiret kākhordaṃ vā kuryād agnikhadā copanāmayet,
S06sspp2_4u:815: śastreṇa vā dadyād viṣaṃ vā dadyād udake cainaṃ chorayet sarvaṃ tat tasya na kramiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:816: mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā anuttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:817: [ŚsP_II-4_24] niruttareyaṃ kauśika vidyā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:818: atra ca vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇeḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:819_0: tathā hi so 'tra śikṣamāṇo nātmānam upalabhate na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:819_1: na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:819_2: na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate na kārakam upalabhate na vedakaṃ upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:819_3: na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:926: anupalambhamāno nātmavyābādhāya cetayate na paravyābādhāya cetayate nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06sspp2_4u:928: sarvasattvānāṃ cittāni vyavalokayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:929: atra vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06sspp2_4u:930: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py atra vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06sspp2_4u:931: ye 'pi te etarhi pratyutpanne 'dhvani daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:932: te 'py atraiva vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06sspp2_4u:935: punar aparaṃ kauśika yatremāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyate udgṛhīṣyati na svādhyāpayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyate na yoniśo manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:936: na punar tatra gṛhe vā grāme vā nagare vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vāvatāraprekṣāvatāraṃ lapsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:937_0: tathā hy asyā eva prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārthāya ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau
S06sspp2_4u:937_1: cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā devaputrā yāmā devaputrāḥ tuṣitā devaputrā
S06sspp2_4u:937_2: nirmāṇaratayo devaputrāḥ paranirmitavasavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā devaputrā
S06sspp2_4u:937_3: brahmapurohitā devaputrā brahmapārṣadyā devaputrā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
S06sspp2_4u:937_4: devāḥ apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
S06sspp2_4u:937_5: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā
S06sspp2_4u:937_6: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devā ye 'py aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu
S06sspp2_4u:937_7: lokadhātuṣu cāturmahārājakāyikā devaputrās trāyastriṃśā devaputrāḥ yāmā devaputrās
S06sspp2_4u:937_8: tuṣitā devaputrā nirmāṇaratayo devaputrāḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devaputrā brahmakāyikā
S06sspp2_4u:937_9: devā brahmapurohitā devā brahmapārṣadyā devā mahābrahmāṇo devā ābhā devāḥ parīttābhā
S06sspp2_4u:937_10: devā apramāṇābhā devā ābhāsvarā devāḥ śubhā devāḥ parīttaśubhā devā apramāṇaśubhā
S06sspp2_4u:937_11: devāḥ śubhakṛtsnā devā bṛhā devāḥ parīttabṛhā devā apramāṇabṛhā devā bṛhatphalā devā
S06sspp2_4u:937_12: abṛhā devā atapā devāḥ sudṛśā devāḥ sudarśanā devā akaniṣṭhā devās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:939: te ca devaputrā āgatyaināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā gamiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:940_0: yaḥ kaścit kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyati tasyeme dṛṣṭadhārmikā
S06sspp2_4u:940_1: guṇānuśaṃsā bhaviṣyanti. tad yathāpi nāma kauśika ye kecid bodhimaṇḍe gatā bodhimaṇḍasya
S06sspp2_4u:940_2: ca parisāmantagate na bodhimaṇḍasya cābhyantare tiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinā manuṣyabhūtā
S06sspp2_4u:940_3: vā na te śakyante manuṣyeṇa vā amanuṣyeṇa vā viheṭhayituṃ vā vihiṃsayituṃ vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:941_0: atra hi niṣadya taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
S06sspp2_4u:941_1: abhisaṃbuddhā. ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06sspp2_4u:942_0: ye 'pi te etarhi daśasu dikṣu [ŚsP_II-4_27] lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās
S06sspp2_4u:942_1: tiṣṭhanti te 'py atraiva niṣadyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. taiḥ sarvatathāgatair
S06sspp2_4u:942_2: arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvasattvānām
S06sspp2_4u:947: pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyante pratiṣṭhāpyante ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:948_0: anayaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitayā sa pṛthivīpradeśe sarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūtaḥ kṛto
S06sspp2_4u:948_1: vandanīyo namaskaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyaḥ puṣpair dhūpair
S06sspp2_4u:948_2: mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:950: śakra āha: yo hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S06sspp2_4u:951_0: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhāraya tāṃ ca puṣpair dhūpair mālyair
S06sspp2_4u:951_1: gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed,
S06sspp2_4u:952_0: yaś ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saptaratnamayastūpe tathāgataśarīrāni
S06sspp2_4u:952_1: pratiṣṭhāpayet parihared vā saptaratnamaye samudgate kṛtvā tāni ca satkuryād gurukurād
S06sspp2_4u:952_2: mānayet pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
S06sspp2_4u:955: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra pariprakṣyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:956: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuru. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:957_0: kauśika yeyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā yaś cāyam
S06sspp2_4u:957_1: ātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ. katamasyāṃ pratipati śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
S06sspp2_4u:958: śakra āha: ihaiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:961: atra mayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_28] śikṣamāṇena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā ayaṃ cātmabhāvo 'bhinivartitaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:963: tathāgatas tathāgata iti saṃkhyāgacchati. sarvākārajñatāpratilambhena tu tathāgatas tathāgata iti. saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
S06sspp2_4u:964: yeyaṃ kauśika sarvākārajñatā sā prajñāpāramitā niryātā,
S06sspp2_4u:965_0: evam ayaṃ kauśikātmabhāvas tasya sarvākarajñatājñānasyāśrayabhūta imaṃ cāśrayaṃ niśritya
S06sspp2_4u:965_1: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvākārajñatā anuprāptā evaṃ tasya sarvākārajñatājñānasyāyam
S06sspp2_4u:965_2: ātmabhāva āśrayabhūtasarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūto vandanīyo mānanīyo pūjanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo
S06sspp2_4u:965_3: gurukaraṇīyaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ parinivṛtasyāpi ca kauśika śarīrāny evaṃ śarīrapūjā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:966_0: na tv anyathadharmapūjāḥ yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:966_1: likhitvodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:967_0: puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:967_1: sarvākārajñatājñānasya tena pūjākṛto bhaviṣyati. tasmāt tarhi kauśika śrāddhena kulaputreṇa
S06sspp2_4u:967_2: vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgataṃ pūjayitukāmena iyam eva prajñāpāramitā likhitvodgrahītavyā
S06sspp2_4u:967_3: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:968_0: satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyāḥ puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair
S06sspp2_4u:968_1: vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ yaś ca kauśika tathāgatasya
S06sspp2_4u:969_0: saptaratnamaye vā samugate kṛtvā pariharet tataś ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:969_1: pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:969_2: patākābhiḥ yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgrahīyād dhārayed vācayet paryavāpnuyād
S06sspp2_4u:969_3: yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tāṃ ca satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair dhūpair
S06sspp2_4u:969_4: mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ. ayam
S06sspp2_4u:969_5: eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1056: ato niryātās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_4u:1058_0: śakra āha: ime bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na satkurvanti
S06sspp2_4u:1058_1: na gurukurvanti na mānayanti na pūjayanti tat kiṃ te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā na jānanty
S06sspp2_4u:1060: kauśikāyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye dharma abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā ye saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06sspp2_4u:1061: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣā saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1062: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1063: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā,
S06sspp2_4u:1065: ye dharme abhedyaprasādena samanvāgato ye saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06sspp2_4u:1066: ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ saṃghe niṣkāṅksāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1067: ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatā saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatā.
S06sspp2_4u:1070: kauśika kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1071: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1072: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1073: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1074: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1075: kiyantas te jambūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1076: kiyantas te jāmbūdvipakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1077: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1078: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1079: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1080: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1081: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1082_0: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1082_1: lābhinaḥ tato 'lpakā ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinas [ŚsP_II-4_31] tato 'lpakā
S06sspp2_4u:1082_2: ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhinaḥ tato 'lpakā ye na vānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1085_0: tato 'lpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannās
S06sspp2_4u:1085_1: tato 'lpatarakā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānām
S06sspp2_4u:1085_2: acalabhāgīyānā saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1085_3: prahāṇād arhatas tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1086: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1088: evam etat kauśikaivam etad 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā,
S06sspp2_4u:1091: tato 'lpatarakā ye buddhe niṣkāṅkṣā dharme niṣkāṅkṣāḥ saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1092: tato 'lpatarakā ye buddhe niṣṭhāṅgatā dharme niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ saṃghe niṣṭhāṅgatāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1093: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1094_0: tato 'lpatarakā ye srotaāpannās tato 'lpatarakā ye sakṛdāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā
S06sspp2_4u:1094_1: ye anāgāminas tato 'lpatarakā ye 'rhantaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitās
S06sspp2_4u:1094_2: tato 'lpatarakā ye 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃprasthitās tato 'lpatarakā ye bodhaye
S06sspp2_4u:1095_0: tathā hi pūrvantaiḥ saṃsāre saṃsaradbhiḥ na buddhādṛṣṭo na dharmaśrana saṃghaḥ paryupāsito
S06sspp2_4u:1095_1: na dānaṃ dattaṃ na śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ na kṣāntiṃ bhāvitā na vīryam ālabdhaṃ na dhyānāni
S06sspp2_4u:1145: tad anena te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1146: alpakās te jāmbūdvīpakā sattvā ye buddhe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatā dharme abhedyprasādena samanvāgatā saṃghe abhedyaprasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1152: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1153: tato 'lpatarakā ye rāgadvesamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāminaḥ tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1154: tato 'lpatarakā ye pañcānāṃ mūrdhabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1155: tato 'lpatarakās te jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1157: tato 'lpatarakā ye bodhaye athyāsayena caranti niṣṭhatu kauśika manuṣyāḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1158_0: kauśika kiyanto jāmbūdvīpe prāṇināye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino
S06sspp2_4u:1158_1: ye trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhino ye 'ṣṭānāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ lābhino ye navānām
S06sspp2_4u:1158_2: [ŚsP_II-4_33] anupūrvavihārasamāpattīr lābhino ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino
S06sspp2_4u:1159: kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpannā ye rāgadveṣamohatanutvāt sakṛdāgāmino ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1161_0: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitāḥ kiyants te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1161_1: samyaksaṃbodhau niṣkāṅkṣā buddhe dharme saṃghe niṣkāṅkṣāḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1161_2: prāṇino ye mātṛjñāḥ ye pitṛjñāḥ śrāmaṇyāḥ kule jyeṣṭopacāyakā dānāni dadati śīlaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1164: anātmasaṃjñino 'śucisaṃjñinaḥ sarvalokeṣv anabhirati saṃjñanaḥ kiyantas te jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1166: śakra āha: alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1174: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāminaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1175: ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1176: ye pratyekabodhaye saṃprasthitā alpakās te bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1180: alpakās te kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ prāṇino ye saptatriṃśato bodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1183: ye navānām anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ lābhinaḥ ye catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ lābhino ye ṣaṇṇām abhijñānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1186: ye pañcānām avarabhāgīyāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmino ye pañcānām ūrdhvabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād arhantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1191: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1192: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1195: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhatuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1196: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhante yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1199: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1200: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1203: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā uttarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadivālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1204: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1207: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadlvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1208: prajñāparamitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1211: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1212: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1215: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1216: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1219: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā paścimottarasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1220: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1223: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā adhastād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye carati,
S06sspp2_4u:1224: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭe te yad bhūyastvena śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1227: ihāhaṃ kauśikānāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā upariṣṭād diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu paśyāmy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān sattvān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye caranti,
S06sspp2_4u:1228_0: prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalavirahitās tata eko vā dvau vā avaivartyabhūmau saṃpratiṣṭhate
S06sspp2_4u:1228_1: yad bhūyastvena [ŚsP_II-4_36] śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā saṃtiṣṭhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1231_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika ye te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06sspp2_4u:1231_1: saṃprasthitās taiḥ kṣipraṃ sukhaṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukamair iyaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1232: yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. tair iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya yoniśaś ca manasikṛtvā,
S06sspp2_4u:1234: tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:1236_0: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi
S06sspp2_4u:1236_1: pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ catvāry āryasatyāni catvāri dhyānāni
S06sspp2_4u:1236_2: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:1236_3: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni pañcābhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni
S06sspp2_4u:1236_4: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ mahāmaitri mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1237: anye 'py aparimāṇā buddhadharmā yatra prajñāpāramitāyām antargatā te py udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1238: tathā hi kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caivaṃ jñāsyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:1239: atra hi tathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ śikṣito yad uta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:1241_0: caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caturṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu pañceṣv indriyeṣu
S06sspp2_4u:1241_1: pañcasu baleṣu saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu āryāṣṭāṅge mārge caturṣv āryasatyeṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu
S06sspp2_4u:1241_2: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu navasv anupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu
S06sspp2_4u:1241_3: triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu sarvasamādhiṣu sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu
S06sspp2_4u:1241_4: tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1243: asmābhir apy anuśikṣitavyam eṣāsmākaṃ śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:1244_0: yāvad anye 'py aparimāṇā buddhadharmā etad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ pratyekabuddhānām
S06sspp2_4u:1244_1: arhatām anāgāmināṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ srotaāpannānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1244_2: śikṣamāṇā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1289: buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhā arhanto 'nāgāminaḥ sakṛdāgāminaḥ srotaāpannāḥ pāraṅgatā gacchanti gamiṣyanti ca.
S06sspp2_4u:1291: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā tiṣṭhati tathāgataparinirvṛte vā tathāgate,
S06sspp2_4u:1292: prajñāpāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1293: eṣaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1294: dhyānapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1295: eṣaiva kauśika dhyānapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1296: vīryapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1297: eṣaiva kauśika vīryapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1298: kṣāntipāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1299: eṣaiva kauśika kṣāntipāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurayāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1300: śīlapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1301: eṣaiva kauśika śīlapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1302: dānapāramitaiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1303: eṣaiva kauśika dānapāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratisaraṇam.
S06sspp2_4u:1304: adhyātmaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1305: eṣaiva kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1306: bahirdhāśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1307_0: eṣaiva kauśika bahirdhāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1307_1: pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ. adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyataiva
S06sspp2_4u:1308: eṣaiva kauśikādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1309: śūnyatāśūnyataiva taiḥ [ŚsP_II-4_39] pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1310: eṣaiva kauśika śūnyatāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1311: mahāśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1312: eṣaiva kauśika mahāśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1313: paramārthaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1314: eṣaiva kauśika paramārthaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1315: saṃskṛtaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_4u:1317: asaṃskṛtaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1318: eṣaiva kauśikāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1319: atyantaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1320: eṣaiva kauśika atyantaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1321: anavarāgraśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1322: eṣaiva kauśika anavarāgraśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1323: anavakāraśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1324: eṣaiva kauśika anavakāraśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1325: prakṛtiśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1326: eṣaiva kauśika prakṛtiśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1327: sarvadharmaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1328: eṣaiva kauśika sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1329: svalakṣaṇaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1330: eṣaiva kauśika svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1331: anupalambhaśūnyataiva [ŚsP_II-4_40] taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1332: eṣaiva kauśikānupalambhaśūnyatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratiśaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:1333: abhāvaśūnyataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_4u:1387: sarvākārajñataiva taiḥ pratisatkartavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:1388: etā eva kauśika sarvākārajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ yāvat sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pratisaraṇam.
S06sspp2_4u:1390_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgate parinirvṛte pūjāyai saptaratnamayaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:1390_1: stūpaṃ kārayed yojanamuccaitvenārdhayojanaṃ vistareṇāyāṃ yāvaj jīvaṃ divyaiś puṣpair
S06sspp2_4u:1390_2: divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair
S06sspp2_4u:1390_3: divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyair vādyaiḥ satkuryā
S06sspp2_4u:1390_4: gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1391: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1392: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1394_0: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ [ŚsP_II-4_43] puṇyaṃ prasavati
S06sspp2_4u:1394_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
S06sspp2_4u:1394_2: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1395_0: avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatācittena bhaviṣyaty uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:1395_1: mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
S06sspp2_4u:1396: tiṣṭhantu kauśikaikaḥ stūpaḥ sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataparinirvṛte,
S06sspp2_4u:1397_0: imaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ saptaratnamayais stūpaiḥ paripūraye yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistātais
S06sspp2_4u:1397_1: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1397_2: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1397_3: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1398: kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1399: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1401: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06sspp2_4u:1402: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1404: uttare ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:1406_0: sacet kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ cāturmahādvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate
S06sspp2_4u:1406_1: parinirvṛte pūjayaiḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais
S06sspp2_4u:1406_2: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1406_3: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1406_4: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1407: kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1408: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1410: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1411: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1412_0: likhitvā nu satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair [ŚsP_II-4_44]
S06sspp2_4u:1412_1: gandhair vilepanaiś curṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1413_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturmahādvīpako lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ. sacet kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:1413_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ cūḍikaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte
S06sspp2_4u:1413_2: pūjāyai saptaratnamayais stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais
S06sspp2_4u:1413_3: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyair puṣpair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1413_4: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1413_5: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:1414: kauśikāpi nu kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:1415: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:1417: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1418: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvodgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:1420: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:1421_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasracūḍiko lokadhātus tathāgatastūpaparipūrṇaḥ. sacet kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:1421_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imaṃ trisāhasraṃ madhyamaṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgate parinirvṛte
S06sspp2_4u:1421_2: pūjāyai saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpaiḥ paripūrayed yojanocchritair ardhayojanavistārais
S06sspp2_4u:1421_3: tāṃś ca yāvat kṣīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1421_4: mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś cīvarair divyair
S06sspp2_4u:1421_5: vastrair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kiṃ manyase?
