S06sspp2_4u:2985: upariṣṭād diśi bahūni buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvānti drakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:2986_0: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ bahūni saptaratnamayāni stūpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi drakṣanti
S06sspp2_4u:2986_2: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkriyamānān gurukriyamānāṃ mānyamānān pūjyamānān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:2988: sa khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān eva rūpān bhadrakā svapnān drakṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:2989: sa sukham eva śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati sukhaṃ ca prativibhotsyate srotaprakṣiptaś cāsya kāyo bhhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:2990: laghusaṃjñā ca kāye saṃjñāsyate na gurusaṃjñā na cāsya balavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati na cīvaragṛddhir bhaviṣyati na glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāragṛdhir bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:2991: mṛddhī cāsyāhārasaṃjñā bhaviṣyati mṛddhīcīvarasaṃjñā bhaviṣyati mṛddhīglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ saṃjñā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:2992: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika yogācārasya bhikṣoḥ samādhavyutthitasya manasikārapariṣyandi tena cittena balavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati mṛdukā cāsyāhārasaṃjñā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:2993: evam eva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na bakavatyāhāragṛddhir bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:2994: tathā hi tasyā mānuṣyāḥ kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:2995: ye pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandhharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:2996: ye ca dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:2997: ye paścimāyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:2999: ye ca uttarasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3000: ye uttarapūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3001: pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3002: dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3003: paścimottarasyāṃ diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3004: adhastād diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3005: upariṣṭād diśi ye buddhā bhagavato ye ca bodhisattvā ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās te 'sya kāye srota upasaṃhariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:3006_0: imām api kauśika dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhītukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā
S06sspp2_4u:3006_1: vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitāprayatvataḥ srotavyodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3006_2: paryavāptavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyāḥ. sarvākārajñatācittena cāvirahitena bhavitavyāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:3007_0: atha cet sa kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgṛhīyān
S06sspp2_4u:3007_1: na dhārayen na vācayen na paryavāpnuyān na yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt tena kulaputreṇa
S06sspp2_4u:3007_2: vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitāṃ pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā satkartavyā gurukartavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3007_3: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś cchattrair
S06sspp2_4u:3008: evaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahujanahitāya pratipanno bhaviṣyati bahujanasukhāya pratipanno bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3009_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati na tve vayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3009_1: samatād [ŚsP_II-4_95] daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyakṣaṃbuddhān
S06sspp2_4u:3009_2: saśrāvakasaṃghān yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayed cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāśanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3009_3: parinirvṛtān tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ saptaratnamayān stūpākāryat,
S06sspp2_4u:3010: tāṃś ca yāvaj jīvaṃ satkuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiś patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:3014: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayata:
S06sspp2_4u:3015: sacet tvaṃ kauśikemaṃ jāmbūdvīpaṃ pūrṇaṃ cūḍikāvabaddhaṃ tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ labhethā yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyeta,
S06sspp2_4u:3017_0: śakra āha: sacen me bhagavann ayaṃ jāmbūdvīpaḥ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3017_1: dīpeta yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyeta imām evāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3018: na me bhagavan tatra tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ nāpratyayaṃ nābahumānatā nāpy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgataśarīrāṇi,
S06sspp2_4u:3019: na satkartukāmo na gurukartukāmo na mānayitukāmo na pūjayitukāmaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3020_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā niryātāni tāni śarīrāṇi tena tena tathāgataśarīrāṇi
S06sspp2_4u:3020_1: satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjayante prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni śarīrāṇi
S06sspp2_4u:3021_0: yadāhaṃ bhagavan tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryāṃ gurukuryāṃ mānayeyaṃ pūjayeyaṃ divyaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3021_1: puṣpair divyair mālyair divyair gandhair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyaiś
S06sspp2_4u:3021_2: cīvarair divyaiś chattrair divyair dhvajair divyābhiḥ patākābhir divyaiś ca vādyais
S06sspp2_4u:3021_3: tat prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitānīti kṛtvā yac ca tathāgataśarīrāṇi sadevamānuṣāsurena
S06sspp2_4u:3021_4: lokena satkrīyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante tat prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitānīti kṛtvā.
S06sspp2_4u:3022: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputraḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:3023_0: iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitā agrāhyā arūpiṇī anidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā.
S06sspp2_4u:3023_1: tat kathaṃ tvam agrāhyā prajñāpāramitām arūpiṇīm anidarśanām apratighā ekalakṣaṇā
S06sspp2_4u:3023_2: yad utālakṣaṇā grahītavyāṃ maṃyase. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3024_0: na hi prajñāpāramitā grahāya notsargāya pratyupasthitā na hānaye na vṛddhaye nācayāya
S06sspp2_4u:3024_1: notkṣepāya na saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya na buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3024_2: chorayitrī na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ dātri na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na śrāvakadharmaṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3024_3: dātrī na śaikṣāśaikṣādharmāṇāṃ dātrī na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ chorayitrī nāsaṃskṛtadhātor
S06sspp2_4u:3024_4: dātrī na saṃskṛtadhātoś chorayitrī na dānapāramitāyā dātrī na śīlapāramitāyā dātrī
S06sspp2_4u:3024_5: na kṣāntipāramitāyā dātrī na vīryapāramitāyā dātrī na dhyānapāramitāyā dātri na prajñāpāramitāyā dātrī.
S06sspp2_4u:3072: śakra āha: evam etad bhadanta śāradvatīputraivam etad yo bhadanta śāradvatīputraivaṃ jānāti,
S06sspp2_4u:3073_0: na prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dātri na pṛthagjanadharmaṇāṃ chorayitrī na bodhisattvadharmāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3073_1: dātrī na pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na śrāvakadharmāṇāṃ dātrī na śaikṣāśaikṣadharmāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3073_2: dātrī na pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃś chorayitrī nāsaṃskṛtadhātor dātri na saṃskṛtadhātor chorayitrī.
S06sspp2_4u:3074: na dānapāramitāyā dātrī na śīlapāramitāyā dātrī na kṣāntipāramitāyā dātrī na vīryapāramitāyā dātrī na dhyānapāramitāyā dātrī na prajñāpāramitāyā dātrī.
S06sspp2_4u:3079: na mahāśūnyatāyā dātrī. na paramārthaśūnyatāyā dātri,
S06sspp2_4u:3121: na sarvākārajñatāyā dātrī. sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīḥ sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati.
S06sspp2_4u:3134: atha bhagavāñ chakro devānām indrāya sādhukāram adāt:
S06sspp2_4u:3135: sādhu sādhu kauśikaivam etad yathā nirdiśasi,
S06sspp2_4u:3136: na hi prajñāpāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3141: na hi prajñāpāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3146: na hi vīryapāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3151: na hi śīlapāramitā dvayato 'nugantavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3156: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3157: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3158: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched [ŚsP_II-4_99] yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3159: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3160: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3161: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3162: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3163: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3164: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3165: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca śīlapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3166: dharmadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3167: tathā hi kauśika dharmadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:3168: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3169: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3170: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3171: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3172: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3173: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3174: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3175: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3176: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3177: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca śīlapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3178: tathatāyāḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3179: tathā hi kauśika tathatā ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:3180: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3181: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3182: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3183: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3184: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3185: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3186: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā [ŚsP_II-4_100] dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3187: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3188: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3189: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca śīlapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3190: bhūtakoṭeḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3191: tathā hi kauśika bhūtakoṭiś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:3192: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3193: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca prajñāpāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram,
S06sspp2_4u:3194: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dhyānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3195: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca dhyānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3196: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo vīryapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3197: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhhātuś ca vīryapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3198: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3199: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca kṣāntipāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3200: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3201: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca śīlapāramita cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3202: acintyadhātoḥ sa kauśika dvayam icched yo dānapāramitāyā dvayam icchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3203: tathā hi kauśikācintyadhātuś ca dānapāramitā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:3205: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:3206: namaskaraṇīyeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokeṇa yatra śikṣitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate,
S06sspp2_4u:3208: yadāhaṃ bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ tasminn evendrāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi yan me svakam āsanaṃ tatra devaputrā mamopasthānāyāgacchanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3209_0: te māṃ pūjayanti yadā tatra na gacchāmi tatrāsanena niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi tadā te devaputrās
S06sspp2_4u:3209_1: tāṃ sabhām āgatya tad āsanaṃ namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punar eva prakrāmati. iha
S06sspp2_4u:3209_2: śakro devānām indro niṣadya devebhyas trayastriṃśebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati. evam etad
S06sspp2_4u:3209_3: bhagavan yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dhārayiṣyate svādhyāyiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:3211: tatra ye te daśadiglokadhātuṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragās [ŚsP_II-4_101] te tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vanditvā namaskṛtya prakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3212_0: ito niryātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ito niryātāś ca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā
S06sspp2_4u:3212_1: ito niryātaṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yad api tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjā labhante
S06sspp2_4u:3212_2: tad api prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitatvāt pūjāṃ pratilabhante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3213_0: prajñāpāramitā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacārikāṃ carataḥ sarvajñajñānasyāśrayabhūtā
S06sspp2_4u:3213_1: pratyayabhūtā kāraṇabhūtā āhārikā tasmāt tarhi bhagavann anayor dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor
S06sspp2_4u:3213_2: imām evāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ yadāhaṃ bhagavann imāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06sspp2_4u:3213_3: udgṛhīṣyāmy udgṛhya svādhyāyaṃ karomi dharmāntargatena mānasena nimittaṃ apy ahaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3213_4: bhagavan tasmin samaye na samanupaśyāmi bhayasya vā stambhitatvasya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3214: animittā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:3215: animittā hi bhagavan dhyānapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:3216: animittā hi bhagavan vīryapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:3217: animittā hi bhagavan kṣāntipāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:3218: animittā hi bhagavan śīlapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:3219: animittā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan dānapāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:3220: animittā hi bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3221: animittā hi bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3222: animittā hi bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3223: animittā hi bhagavañ chūnyatāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavañ chūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3224: animittā hi bhagavan mahāśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3225: animittā hi bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3226: animittā hi bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūnyatā aliṅga anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūṅyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3227: animittā hi bhagavann asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhāra hi bhagavann asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3228: animittā hi bhagavann atyantaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann atyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3229: animittā hi bhagavann anavarāgraśūnyatā aliṅgā [ŚsP_II-4_102] anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anavarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3230: animittā hi bhagavann anavakāraśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anavakāraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3231: animittā hi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3232: animittā hi bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan sarvadharmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3233: animittā hi bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3234: animittā hi bhagavann anupalambhaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anupalambhaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3235: animittā hi bhagavann abhāvaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann abhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3236: animitta hi bhagavan svabhāvasūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan svabhāvaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3237: animitta hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06sspp2_4u:3238: animittāni hi bhagavan smṛtyupasthānāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavan smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3239: animittāni hi bhagavan samyakprahāṇāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyahārāṇi hi bhagavan samyakprahāṇāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3240: animittā hi bhagavann ṛddhipadā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann ṛddhipādaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3241: animittāni hi bhagavann indriyāṇy aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhāraṇi hi bhagavann indriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_4u:3242: animittāni hi bhagavan balāny aliṅgāny anabhilapyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavann indriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_4u:3243: animittāni hi bhagavan bodhyaṅgāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhāraṇi hi bhagavan bodhyaṅgāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3244: animittaḥ hi bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo 'liṅgo 'nabhilāpyo 'pravyāhāro hi bhagavann āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3245: animittāni hi bhagavann āryasatyāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavann āryasatyāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3246: animittāni hi bhagavan dhyānāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyahārāṇi hi bhagavann dhyānāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3247: animittāni hi bhagavann apramāṇāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhāṛāṇi hi bhagavann apramāṇāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3248: animittā hi bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattayo 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3249: animittā hi bhagavan vimokṣā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan vimokṣāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3250: animittā hi bhagavann anupūrvaviharasamāpattayo 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann anupūrvaviharasamāpattayaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3251: animittāni hi bhagavañ chūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamukhāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavañ chūnyatanimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3252: animittā hi [ŚsP_II-4_103] bhagavann abhijñā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann abhijñāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3253: animittā hi bhagavan samādhayo 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan samādhayaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3254: animittāni hi bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhany aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavan dhāraṇīmukhāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3255: animittāni hi bhagavaṃs tathāgatabalāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavaṃs tathāgatabalāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3256: animittāni hi bhagavan vaiśāradyāny aliṅgāny anabhilāpyāny apravyāhārāṇi hi bhagavan vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3257: animittā hi bhagavan pratisaṃvido 'liṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3258: animittā hi bhagavan mahākaruṇāliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_4u:3259: animittā hi bhagavann āveṇikabuddhadharmā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavann āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3260: animittā hi bhagavan sarvajñatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3261: animittā hi bhagavan mārgākārajñatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3262: animittā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_4u:3264_0: saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nimittam abhaviṣyan nānimittaṃ naiva tasya tathāgato
S06sspp2_4u:3264_1: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmān nimittān aliṅgān abhilāpyān apravyāhārān viditvā
S06sspp2_4u:3264_2: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilāpyam
S06sspp2_4u:3265: yasmāt tarhi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā animittā aliṅgā anabhilāpyā apravyāhārā tamāt tathāgataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3266_0: sarvadharmān aliṅgān anabhilāpyān apravyāhārān viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya
S06sspp2_4u:3266_1: sattvānām animittam aliṅgam anabhilāpyam apravyāhāraṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati. tasmāt
S06sspp2_4u:3266_2: tarhi bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sadevamanuṣāsureṇa lokena satkartavyā gurukartavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3266_3: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
S06sspp2_4u:3266_4: dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. likhitvā ca satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3266_5: pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3267: yo hi kaścid bhagavann imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3268: tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3269: puṣpair mālyair gandhair [ŚsP_II-4_104] vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:3270: tasya narakagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na tiryagyonir na yamalokagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:3272: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. avirahitaś ca bhaviṣyati tathāgatadarśanena sattvaparipācakena ca buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3273: tāṃś ca tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan mānayet pūjayet,
S06sspp2_4u:3274: puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaih.
S06sspp2_4u:3275_0: punar bhagavan saced ayaṃ trisāhasro lokadhātuś cūḍikāvabaddhaḥ syāt tathāgataśarīraiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3275_1: pūrṇo yac ceyaṃ prajñāpāramitā likhitvopanāmyate. anayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayor bhāgayor
S06sspp2_4u:3275_2: imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3276_0: ato niryātā hi bhagavans tathāgatās tāni ca tathāgataśarīrāṇi tena tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi
S06sspp2_4u:3276_1: satkriyante gurukriyante mānyante pūjyante yāni kulaputrāś ca kuladuhitaraś ca satkṛtya
S06sspp2_4u:3276_2: gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā na durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ gacchanti. divyamānuṣīḥ saṃpattīr
S06sspp2_4u:3276_3: anubhūya yathā praṇidhānaṃ parinirvāti. yadi vā śrāvakayānena yadi vā pratyekabuddhayānena
S06sspp2_4u:3277: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yac ca tathāgatadarśanaṃ yac ca prajñāpāramitāyā darśanaṃ tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3278: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ca tathāgataś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_4u:3279_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas triṣu prātihāryeṣu
S06sspp2_4u:3280: yac ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai deśayet tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3281_0: ito niryātā hi bhagavan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti niryātāni trīṇi prātihāryāṇi.
S06sspp2_4u:3282: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvalukopamāṃ tathāgatān arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3293_1: yac ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya parasmai
S06sspp2_4u:3293_2: deśayet tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3294_0: ito niryātā hi te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ito niryātā tāni
S06sspp2_4u:3294_1: triṇi prātihāryāṇi ito niryātaṃ sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānaṃ nidānetyuktakajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmāvadānopadeśāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:3295_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yac ca te daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06sspp2_4u:3295_1: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satkriyeran gurukriyeran mānayeran
S06sspp2_4u:3295_2: pūjayeran puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3295_3: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. yaś ca prajñāpāramitā pustakaṃ likhitvā satkriyeta
S06sspp2_4u:3295_4: gurukriyeta mānyeta pūjyeta puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś
S06sspp2_4u:3295_5: chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyais tulyam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3296: ito niryātā hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:3297_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:3297_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati parebhyaś ca vistareṇa
S06sspp2_4u:3297_2: saṃprakāśayiṣyati tasya narakagatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā na tiryagyonir na yamalokagatiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3297_3: pratikāṅkṣitavyā na śrāvakabhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3298: tathā hi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sthito 'vaivartyabhūmau veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3299_0: tathā hi sa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti
S06sspp2_4u:3299_1: yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tāṃ ca likhitvā satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati puṣpair
S06sspp2_4u:3299_2: mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś
S06sspp2_4u:3299_3: ca vādyais tathā hi bhagavan sarvabhayapraśamani sarvaroganirghātanīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:3300_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvodgṛhīṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:3300_1: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati tāṃ ca satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:3300_2: pūjayiṣyati puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3300_3: patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyais tasya na kutaścid bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:3301_0: tad yathāpi nāma [ŚsP_II-4_106] bhagavan dhanikabhayabhītaḥ puruṣo rājānaṃ seveta
S06sspp2_4u:3301_1: rājānam upatiṣṭheta sa rājānaṃ sevamāno rājānam upatiṣṭhamāno yata evāsya bhayaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3301_2: bhavati ta evaivaṃ sevante na ca sa tebhyo bibheti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3302: evam etad bhagavan bhavati yo rājaniḥśrito bhavati balavatiniśrito bhavati.
S06sspp2_4u:3303: evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhate. yad api bhagavan sarvākārajñatājñānaṃ tad api prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitaṃ draṣṭavyam,
S06sspp2_4u:3304: tasmād ahaṃ bhagavann anayor dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhṇīyāt. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3305_0: ito niryātāni hi bhagavan tathāgataśarīrāṇy ato niryātāni dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny
S06sspp2_4u:3305_1: ato niryātāni tathāgatasya daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
S06sspp2_4u:3306: ato niryātā mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā ato niryātā bhagavan pañcapāramitā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3307_0: yāvad ato niryātā tathāgatasya sarvākārajñatā yatra bhagavan grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu
S06sspp2_4u:3307_1: yatra ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyate
S06sspp2_4u:3307_2: vācayiṣyate paryavāpsyate tāṃ ca likhitvā satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyate pūjayiṣyate,
S06sspp2_4u:3308: tena tatra manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vāvatāraprekṣy avatāragaveṣy avatāraṃ lapsyate. sarve ca te anupūrveṇa parinirvānadharmāṇo bhaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3309: trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ manyat amānyat anena yānena. evaṃ mahārthikā bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:3310: atra hi nāma bhagavaṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvānāṃ buddhasatyena pratyupasthitā buddhotpādo bhagavaṃs tatra lokadhātau pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:3312: tad yathāpi nāma bhagavann anargho 'yaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3313: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnam ebhir evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3316: yatrāmanuṣyagṛhītā stri vā puruṣo vā bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3318_0: tataḥ so 'manuṣyas tasya mahāmaṇiratnasya tejo sahamānaḥ kṣipram evāprakrāman nāvatiṣṭheta
S06sspp2_4u:3318_1: pittena vā dahyamānasya tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ śarīre sthāpyeta tad api pittam atigṛhṇīyāt
S06sspp2_4u:3318_2: pātābhibhūte vā śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyet tad api vā taṃ atigṛhṇīyāt.
S06sspp2_4u:3319: śleṣmaṇāropastabdhe śarīre tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tad api śleṣmāṇam upaśāmayet sāṃnipātiko vā vyādhir bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3320_0: tac ca mahāmaṇiratnaṃ śarīre sthāpyeta tad api sāṃnipātikaṃ vyādhim upaśamen nāsau
S06sspp2_4u:3320_1: [ŚsP_II-4_107] vivardheta tad rātrau cāvabhāsaṃ kuryād uṣmakāle ca vartamāne yatra
S06sspp2_4u:3320_2: pradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta tat taṃ pradeśaṃ śītalaṃ kuryāt śītakāle ca
S06sspp2_4u:3320_3: vartamāne yatra pradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpya na tat pradeśam uṣmaṃ kuryāt,
S06sspp2_4u:3321_0: yatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ s sthāpyeta tat pṛthvīpradeśe nātyuṣmaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3321_1: nātiśītamṛdusaṃpannaṃ kuryāt yatra pṛthivīpradeśe tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta na
S06sspp2_4u:3322: tad anye 'pi ca vṛścikādayaḥ sarīsṛpāḥ prāṇino na tatropacaret. yā kācid bhagavan strī vā puruṣo vā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭho bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3323: tasya tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ darśet tasya sahadarśanena tad viṣaṃ vigacchet.
S06sspp2_4u:3324: ebhir bhagavann evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3325_0: yāsām api bhagavan strīṇāṃ vā puruṣāṇāṃ vā arbudaṃ vā timiraṃ vā ajakaṃ vā akṣirogo
S06sspp2_4u:3325_1: vā srotarogo vā ghrāṇarogo vā jihvārogo vā kaṇṭharogo vā kāyarogo vā bhavet teṣāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3326: teṣāṃ tad arbudaṃ vā vā timiraṃ vā ajakaṃ vā akṣirogo vā srotrarogo vā ghrāṇarogo vā jihvārogo vā kaṇṭharogo vā kāyarogo vā upaśāmyet.
S06sspp2_4u:3327: ebhir bhagavann evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3328: yatrāpi bhagavann udake tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ prakṣipet,
S06sspp2_4u:3329: tad eva tad udakam aṣṭāṅgopetam ekavarṇaṃ bhavet.
S06sspp2_4u:3330: sacet bhagavan nīlakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:3331: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3332: sacet pītakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:3333: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3334: sacet lohitakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:3335: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3336: saced avadānakena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:3337: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3338: sacet māñjiṣṭhāvarṇena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:3339: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3340: sacet sphaṭikavarṇena cīvareṇa tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyet,
S06sspp2_4u:3341: tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3342: ebhiś ca nānāprakāraiś cīvarais tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ baddhvodake prakṣipyeta tat svabhāvam eva tad udakaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3343: yad api bhagavaṃs tatrodake kāluṣyante tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ prasādayet,
S06sspp2_4u:3344: ebhir bhagavann evaṃrūpair guṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ [ŚsP_II-4_108] tan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3345: anyaiś ca evam eva bhagavann iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā divyamaṇiratnaprakhyā sarvaguṇākarabhūtā sarvapāpamocanī.
S06sspp2_4u:3347: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:3349: kauśika divyam etan maṇiratnam utāho svij jāṃbudvīpakanāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnam asti.
S06sspp2_4u:3350: śakra āha: divyam etad bhadanta maṇiratnam.
S06sspp2_4u:3351: api tu khalu punar bhadantānanda yāni jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ mānuṣyāṇāṃ mahāmaṇiratnāny asti tāni parīttāni gurūṇi ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3352_0: yāni divyāni tāni mahānti laghūni ca tair aṅgais tāvat suparipūrṇāni jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3352_1: manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni yathā divyāni tāni punar jāṃbūdvīpakāni ratnāni teṣāṃ divyānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3352_2: maṇiratnānāṃ saṃkhyāṃ vā kalāṃ vā gaṇanāṃ vā upamāṃ vā upaniśāṃ vā nopayānti.
S06sspp2_4u:3353: punar api śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:3354_0: tat khalu punar bhagavan mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yasmin karaṇḍake prakṣiptaṃ bhavet yadā kṣiptaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3354_1: bhavet yadā kṣipataṃ ca tataḥ karaṇḍakāt spṛhaṇīyam eva tat karaṇḍakaṃ bhavet tair
S06sspp2_4u:3354_2: maṇiratnaguṇaiḥ paro 'pi tatra karaṇḍake spṛhom utpādayet,
S06sspp2_4u:3355: evam eva bhagavan yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pracariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3356: tatra teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ vā kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā kāyikāś cetasikā vā duḥkhopadravā manuṣyakṛtā vā amanuṣyakṛtā vā na bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3357: mahāmaṇiratnam iti bhagavan prajñāpāramitām etad adhivacanaṃ sarvākārajñatājñānasyaitad adhivacanam.
S06sspp2_4u:3358: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prajñāpāramitāyā guṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhajanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3359: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dhyānapāramitāyā guṇā dhyānapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3360: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ vīryapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi vīryapāramitāyā guṇā vīryapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3361: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi kṣāntipāramitāyā guṇāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhajanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3362: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ śīlapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi śīlapāramitāyā [ŚsP_II-4_109] guṇāḥ śīlapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhajanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3363: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dānapāramitāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dānapāramitāyā guṇā dānapāramitāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam.
S06sspp2_4u:3364: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam adhyātmaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy adhyātmaśūnyatāyā guṇā adhyātmaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3365: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayituṃ aprameyā hi bahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇā bahirdhāśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3366: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā guṇā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3367: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi śūnyatāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3368: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ mahāśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi mahāśūnyatāyā guṇā mahāśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3369: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ paramārthaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi paramārthaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3370: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3371: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā guṇā asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3372: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam atyantaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy atyantaśūnyatāyā guṇā atyantaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3373: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam anavarāgraśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anavarāgraśūnyatāyā guṇā anavarāgraśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3374: kiyanto bhagavañchakyam anavakāraśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anavakāraśūnyatāyā guṇā anavakāraśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3375: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi prakṛtiśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3376: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sarvadharmaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3377: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ [ŚsP_II-4_110] svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3378: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam anupalambhaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy anupalambhaśūnyatāyā guṇā anupalambhaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3379: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam abhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy abhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇā abhāvaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3380: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi svabhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇāḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3381: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā guṇā abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam.
S06sspp2_4u:3382: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi smṛtyupasthānānāṃ guṇāḥ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:3383: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ samyakprahāṇānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi samyakprahāṇānāṃ guṇā samyakprahāṇānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3384: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇām ṛddhipādānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy ṛddhipādānāṃ guṇā ṛddhipādānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3385: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ pañcānām indriyānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy indriyānāṃ guṇā indriyānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:3386: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ pañcānaṃ balānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi balānāṃ guṇā balānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3387: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ saptānāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi bodhyaṅgānāṃ guṇā bodhyaṅgānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3388: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasya guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy āryāṣtāṅgasya mārgasya guṇā āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3389: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇam āryasatyānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy āryasatyānāṃ guṇā aryasatyānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīraṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3390: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dhyānānāṃ guṇā dhyānānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3391: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ caturṇām apramāṇānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy apramāṇānāṃ guṇā apramāṇānāṃ ca tāni [ŚsP_II-4_111] tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3392: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ catasṛṇām ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ guṇā ārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3393: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi vimokṣāṇāṃ guṇā vimokṣāṇāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3394_0: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā
S06sspp2_4u:3394_1: hy anupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ guṇā anupūrvavihārasamāpattināṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3395_0: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum
S06sspp2_4u:3396: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam abhijñānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyāhy abhijñānāṃ guṇā abhijñānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3397: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ samādhīnāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi samādhīnāṃ guṇāḥ samādhīnāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3398: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ guṇā dhāraṇīmukhānāṃ ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3399: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi tathāgatabalānāṃ guṇāḥ tathāgatabalānāṃ ca i tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,

S06sspp2_4u:3407: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvākārajñatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sarvākārajñatāyā guṇāḥ sarvākārajñatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,

S06sspp2_4u:3409: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam avitathatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy avitathatāyā guṇā avitathatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3410: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam ananyatathatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy ananyatathatāyā guṇā ananyatathatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:3411: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmatāyā guṇā dharmatāyaś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:3412: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmadhātor guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmadhātor guṇā dharmadhātoś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:3413: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmasthititāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmasthititāyā guṇā dharmasthititāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3414: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ dharmaniyāmatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi dharmaniyāmatāyā guṇāḥ dharmaniyāmatāyāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3415: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ bhūtakoṭer guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi bhūtakoṭer guṇā bhūtakoṭeś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:3416: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam acintyadhātor guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy acintyadhātor guṇā acintyadhātoś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam,
S06sspp2_4u:3417_0: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasya guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum
S06sspp2_4u:3418: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyaṃ sadopekṣāvihāritāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hi sadopekṣāvihāritāyā guṇāḥ sadopekṣāvihāritayāś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3419: kiyanto bhagavañ chakyam asaṃpramosadharmatāyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum aprameyā hy asaṃpramoṣadharmatāyā guṇā asaṃpramoṣadharmatāyaś ca tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanam.
S06sspp2_4u:3434: tayā ca dharmatāpāramitayā paribhāvitāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi tena parinirvṛtasyāpi tasya tathāgatasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
S06sspp2_4u:3436: punar aparaṃ bhagavan tiṣṭhantu trisāhasramahāsāḥsro lokadhātus tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3437: sacet bhagavan daśasu dikṣuḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ pūrṇacūḍikāvabaddhā bhaveyur yac ca prajñāpāramitāpustakaṃ likhitvopanāmyetaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3438: anayor ahaṃ bhagavan dvayoḥ pratyaṅgayor imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ gṛhīyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3439: ato niryātāni hi bhagavan tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjyaṃte prajñāpāramitā paribhāvitani bhagavaṃs tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante.
S06sspp2_4u:3440_0: yaḥ punar bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād
S06sspp2_4u:3440_1: mānayet pūjayet sa tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya devamanuṣyasaṃpattīr anubhūya
S06sspp2_4u:3440_3: deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu yāmeṣu deveṣu tuṣiteṣu deveṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu deveṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu
S06sspp2_4u:3440_4: deveṣu sukham anubhūya tenaiva kuśalamūlena duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3441: etāvat tathāgataśarīrapūjāyāḥ phalam imāṃ punaḥ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan yoniśaś ca manasikurvan samādhipāramitāṃ ca paripūrayiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3486: śrāvakabhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3491_0: yadi vā cakravartāśrayaṃ yadi vā kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu
S06sspp2_4u:3491_1: yadi vā gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu yadi vā śakrarūpeṇa yadi vā brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yadi vā
S06sspp2_4u:3491_2: vaiśramaṇarūpeṇa sa tair ātmabhāvaiḥ sattvān paripācayiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:3492: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan na mama tathāgataśarīreṣv agauravaṃ nāpy apratyayā nāpy apūjayitukāmatā nāpy agrahītukāmatā.
S06sspp2_4u:3493_0: api tu khalu punar bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvatā
S06sspp2_4u:3493_1: gurukurvatā mānayatā pūjayata sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ hetur upacito bhavati sarvasaṃpattayaś
S06sspp2_4u:3494: tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkṛtā bhavanti gurukṛtāni bhavanti yāni tāni bhavanti pūjitāni bhavanti.
S06sspp2_4u:3495_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan ye daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā [ŚsP_II-4_115]
S06sspp2_4u:3495_1: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyate yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti tān
S06sspp2_4u:3495_2: dhharmakāyena ca jñānakāyena ca draṣṭukāmena pūjayitukāmena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3495_3: dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3496_0: sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsakhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tāṃ tathāgatān
S06sspp2_4u:3496_1: arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāṃ drakṣyati. evaṃ khalu tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā
S06sspp2_4u:3496_2: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca tāṃ buddhān anusmṛtibhāvayitavyā dharmatayā.
S06sspp2_4u:3497: punar aparaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saṃdraṣṭukāmena,
S06sspp2_4u:3498_0: kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitodgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3498_1: paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā pūjayitavyā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3500: katame dve saṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā asaṃskṛtā ca dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā?
S06sspp2_4u:3502_0: yad adhyātmaśūnyatāyaṃ jñānaṃ yad bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3502_1: jñānaṃ yad śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad mahāśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3502_2: jñānaṃ yad saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3502_3: jñānaṃ yad anavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3502_4: jñānaṃ yad sarvadharmaśūnyatayāṃ jñānaṃ yad svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad anupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3502_5: jñānaṃ yad abhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānaṃ yad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ jñānam.
S06sspp2_4u:3534: yasyā notpādo na nirodho na sthānaṃ na sthito nānyathātvaṃ na saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ na hānir na vṛddhir yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvatā,
S06sspp2_4u:3540: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3541: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06sspp2_4u:3542: ye 'pi te etarhi daśadig lokadhātuṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06sspp2_4u:3543: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāyām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06sspp2_4u:3544: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atītānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3545: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgatānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3546: ye 'py etarhi pratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3547: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpsyanti prāpnuvanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3553_0: ye 'pi te etarhi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu pratyekabuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante
S06sspp2_4u:3553_1: yāpayanti tair apīmām eva prajñāpāramitām āgamya pratyekabodhiḥ prāptāḥ prāpsyate
S06sspp2_4u:3554: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyā sarvāṇi trīṇi yānāni vistareṇopadiṣṭāni,
S06sspp2_4u:3555_1: [ŚsP_II-4_117] tat punar lokavyavahāreṇa na paramārthena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3556: na hi prajñāpāramitā āramitā na pāramitā na hi prajñāpāramitā apāro na pāraḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3557: na sthalaṃ na nimnaṃ na samaṃ na viṣamaṃ na nimittaṃ nānimittaṃ na laukikī na lokottarā na saṃskṛtā nāsaṃskṛtā na kuśalā nākuśalā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06sspp2_4u:3558: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā buddhadharmānāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3559: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā srotaāpattidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3560: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sakṛdāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3561: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā anāgāmidharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3562: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā arhaddharmāṇāṃ dātrī na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pratyekabuddhadharmāṇāṃ dātrī,
S06sspp2_4u:3563: na hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ dātrī.
S06sspp2_4u:3565: śakra āha: mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:3566_0: atra bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni
S06sspp2_4u:3566_1: prajānanti na sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptim upalabhate nātmanam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:3566_2: na sattvam upalabhate na jīvam upalabhate na jantum upalabhate na poṣam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:3566_3: na puruṣam upalabhate na pudgalam upalabhate na manujam upalabhate na mānavam upalabhate
S06sspp2_4u:3566_4: na kārakam upalabhate na vedakam upalabhate na jānakam upalabhate na paśyakam upalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:3677: na hi prajñāpāramitopalambhayogena pratyupasthitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3678: tathā hi tasyāḥ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yenopalabhet yad vopapalabhet yatra vopalabhet.
S06sspp2_4u:3682: yathā hi tad dīrgharātrau bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupalambhayogena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sa bodhim api nopalabhhate prāg eva buddhaṃ prāg eva buddhadharmān.
S06sspp2_4u:3683: śakra āha: punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati na tadanyāsu pāramitāsu.
S06sspp2_4u:3685: sarvāsu kauśika ṣaḍpāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati tac cānupalambhayogena. sa dānam api nopalabhate dāyakam api nopalabhate pratigrāhakam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3686: śīlam api nopalabhate śīlavantam api nopalabhate dauḥśīlam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3687: kṣāntim api nopalabhate kṣamīnam api nopalabhate vyāpādam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3688: vīryam api nopalabhate vīryavantam api nopalabhate kauśīdyam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3689: dhyānam api nopalabhate dhyāyinam api nopalabhate vikṣepam api nopalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:3690: prajñām api nopalabhate prajñāvantam api nopalabhate dauṣprajñam api nopalabhate.
S06sspp2_4u:3691: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitā pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ dadato dānapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3692: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ śīlapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3693: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntyā saṃpādāya kṣāntipāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3694: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryam ālambhamānasya vīryapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3695: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānapāramitāparipūraye,
S06sspp2_4u:3696: prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṅgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmān viviktataḥ prajñāpāramitāparipūraye sarvadharmānupalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:3804: tad yathāpi nāma kauśika jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ nānāpatrāṇāṃ nānāpuṣpāṇāṃ nānāphalānāṃ nānāsaṃkhyānāṃ nānārohapariṇāhānāṃ teṣāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_4u:3805_0: anyatra cchāyā cchāyety evaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti. evam eva kauśika pañcānāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_122]
S06sspp2_4u:3805_1: pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītānāṃ sarvajñajñānapariṇāmitānāṃ ca viśeṣo nānākraṇaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:3808_1: bhagavan prajñāpāramitā aparyavasānaguṇasamanvāgatayā tayā hi kaścid bhagavan kulaputro
S06sspp2_4u:3808_2: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayet tāś ca
S06sspp2_4u:3808_3: satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś
S06sspp2_4u:3808_4: cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair uttare ca yathopadiṣṭāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3808_5: prajñāpāramitāṃ yoniśo manasikuryād yo 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3808_6: pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā parasmai dadyāt kataras tayor bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
S06sspp2_4u:3810: tena hi kauśika tvām evātra paripakṣyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:3811: yathā te kṣamate tathā vyākuru. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:3812_0: kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:3812_1: pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3813: yaś ca kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ parasmai dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt so 'pi kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S06sspp2_4u:3814_0: tat sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ gṛhītvā satkuyād gurukruyāt mānayet pūjayet
S06sspp2_4u:3814_1: puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
S06sspp2_4u:3816: śakra āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavatā bhāṣitasvārtham ājānāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:3817_0: yo yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīrāṇi satkuryād gurukuryād mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:3817_1: pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhavajaiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3818: yo 'pi parasmai sarṣapaphalamātraṃ tathāgataśarīraṃ dadyād ayaṃ tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3820_0: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vajropamaṃ samādhiḥ samāpadyaḥ vajropamam ātmabhāvaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3820_1: bhittvā tathāgataśarīrāṇy adhiṣṭhitāni mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayya sattvakāye tathāgatadhātuvainayikānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3821_0: ye hi kecid bhagavan tathagatasyāntasaḥ sarṣapaphalamātraṃ dhātuṃ pūjayiṣyanti vividhābhiḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3821_1: pūjābhiḥ sarve te tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam [ŚsP_II-4_123] adhigamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:3824_0: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3824_1: kṛtvā satkuryād gurukruyād mānayet pūjayet puṣpair mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś
S06sspp2_4u:3824_2: cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3824_3: parasmai likhitvā dadyād dharmaprītyā ayaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:3826_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathopadiṣṭā
S06sspp2_4u:3826_1: parebhyo gatvā ācakṣīt deśayet saṃprakāśayet vicaret vibhajet uttānīkuryād ayaṃ sa
S06sspp2_4u:3826_2: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ pūrvakānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāñ cāntikād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3827: śāstaiva saṃpratikāṅkṣitavyānyatarānyatarīyā gurusthānīyā vijñāḥ sabrahmacārī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3828: eṣa evātra kauśika śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā na hy anyaḥ śāstānyā prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitaiva śāstā śāstaiḥ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3829: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇair atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbudhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3830_0: ye 'pi te vijñāḥ sabrahmacāriṇas te 'pi nānye anyatrāvaivartikabodhisattvebhyo yatra
S06sspp2_4u:3830_2: 'bhisaṃbhotsyate ca. atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śrāvakayānikā api śikṣitvā
S06sspp2_4u:3834: pratyekabuddhayānikā api śikṣitvā pratyekabodhin abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃvuddhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3835: bodhisattvā api mahāsattvāḥ śikṣitvā bodhisattvaniyamam avakrāntā avakrāmanti avakrāmiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3836: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhānte abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:3837_0: tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā tathāgatān arhataḥ sayakṣaṃbuddhānāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3837_1: mukhaṃ satkartukāmair gurukartukāmair mānayitukāmaiḥ pūjayitukāmaiḥ puṣpair mālyair
S06sspp2_4u:3837_2: gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyair
S06sspp2_4u:3837_3: iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyāḥ puṣpair
S06sspp2_4u:3837_4: [ŚsP_II-4_124] mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
S06sspp2_4u:3837_5: vividhaiś ca vādyair imaṃ cārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaitad abhūt,
S06sspp2_4u:3838_0: katamad ahaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ so 'haṃ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:3838_1: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyām
S06sspp2_4u:3838_2: ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ cādhikaṃ vā na samanupaśyāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:3840_0: ya nv eva mayā dharmābhisaṃbuddhaḥ śāntaḥ praṇītas tam eva dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya
S06sspp2_4u:3840_1: mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya vihareyaṃ katamaś cāsau kauśika dharmā yad uta saiva
S06sspp2_4u:3840_2: prajñāpāramitā aham eva tāvat kauśikemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkaromi gurukaromi mānayāmi
S06sspp2_4u:3840_3: pūjayāmi satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśrāya viharāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:3841_0: kim aṅga punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmeneyaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3841_1: prajñāpāramitā na satkartavyā na gurukartavyā na mānayitavyā na pūjayitavyā puṣpair
S06sspp2_4u:3841_2: mālyaiar gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3842_0: śrāvakayānikair vā kauśika kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā pratyekabudhayānikair
S06sspp2_4u:3842_1: api kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3842_2: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
S06sspp2_4u:3842_3: dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3843_0: prajñāpāramitā niryātā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniryātāś ca tathāgatā
S06sspp2_4u:3843_1: arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tathāgataniryātāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhās tasmāt tarhi kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:3843_2: bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā śrāvakayānikaiś ca pratyekabuddhayanikaiś
S06sspp2_4u:3843_3: ca kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā iyam eva prajñāpāramitā satkartavyā gurukartavyā
S06sspp2_4u:3843_4: mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair
S06sspp2_4u:3843_5: dhavajaiḥ patākābhir vividhaiś ca vādyaiḥ. yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś
S06sspp2_4u:3843_6: cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca śrāvakayānikāś
S06sspp2_4u:3843_7: cārhattvaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca pratyekabuddhayānīkāś ca pratyekabodhiṃ
S06sspp2_4u:3847: atha bhagavāñ chakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayeta:
S06sspp2_4u:3848: sacet kauśika jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:3849: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānāṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:3850: śakra āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06sspp2_4u:3852: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet yo 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pustakaṃ parasmai dadyāt paṭhanāya vā likhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3853: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti ca avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3854: srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3855: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3856: anagāmiphalaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3857: arhattvaṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3858: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāś ca prāpnuvanti ca prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3859: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthitā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntāś cāvakramanti cāvakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3861: katame ca te kauśika sāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3862: yad uta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni.
S06sspp2_4u:3881: aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3882_0: ime te kauśika anāsravā dharmā ye prajñāpāramitayā nirdiṣṭā yatra śikṣitvā kulaputrāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3882_1: kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāś cābhisaṃbudhyante cābhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3883: evaṃ kauśikaikaṃ sattvaṃ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpya kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā [ŚsP_II-4_126] bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3884: na tv eva jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3885_0: daśasu kauśika kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ sattvā aparimuktā evaṃ narakatiryagyoner
S06sspp2_4u:3885_1: yamalokān srotaāpattiphale kauśika sattvaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ parimukto narakatiryagyoner yamalokān,
S06sspp2_4u:3886: kaḥ punar vādaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale 'rhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06sspp2_4u:3887: yaś ca punaḥ kauśika sarvajāmbūdvīpakān sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06sspp2_4u:3888: yaś caikaṃ sattvaṃ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3889_0: yo vā kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā sarvajāmbūdvīpakān pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayed
S06sspp2_4u:3889_1: yaś ca kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ekam api sattvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_4u:3889_2: pratiṣṭhāpayed ayam eva bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3891: ya ekasattvam apy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3892_0: bodhisattvanirjātā hi kauśika srotaāpannāḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhantaḥ pratyekabuddhā
S06sspp2_4u:3892_1: bodhisattvaniryātā hi kauśika tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tad anena kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:3892_2: paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam. bodhisattvo 'pi pūjayitavyo mānayitavyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3892_3: puṣpair dhūpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
S06sspp2_4u:3893: sa devakena lokena samārakena saśravaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajñāyāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:3894: yo hi kaścit kauśika kulaputro vā kuladhitā vā jāmbūdvīpakān sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:3895: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:3898: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:3900: paṭhanāya vā likhanāya vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3901: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitva samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3906: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti [ŚsP_II-4_127] prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3907: bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāntā avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:3909: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramita dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā.
S06sspp2_4u:3933_0: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry aryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:3933_3: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:3933_4: tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:3934: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:3935: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:3936: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:3960: bṛhatphalā devāḥ prajñāyante. abṛhā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:3964: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:4030_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau
S06sspp2_4u:4030_1: sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā [ŚsP_II-4_129] vā daśasu kuśaleṣu
S06sspp2_4u:4031: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:4034: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:4036: paṭhanāya vā Iekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:4037: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caśikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrānto avakramanty avakramiṣyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:4042: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:4043: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:4044: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
S06sspp2_4u:4045: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:4070_0: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:4070_2: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:4071: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:4072: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:4073: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:4074: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_130] vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:4103: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:4169: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:4170: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro yā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:4173: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:4175: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:4176: tathā hy atra prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
S06sspp2_4u:4182: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:4183: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:4184: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyate abhisaṃbhotsyate ca.
S06sspp2_4u:4185: katame te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:4210_0: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:4210_2: daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:4211: mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06sspp2_4u:4212: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo dadyāt paṭhanāyāpi lekhanāyāpi vācanāyāpi,
S06sspp2_4u:4213: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:4214: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmā upadiṣṭā yaiḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakulāni prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:4243: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,
S06sspp2_4u:4309_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sahasracūḍikā lokadhātuḥ yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau
S06sspp2_4u:4309_1: sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06sspp2_4u:4309_2: tat kiṃ manyase kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.

S06sspp2_4u:5285_2: caturṣv apramāṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayec catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpttiṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet pañcasv
S06sspp2_4u:5286: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:5289: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:5291: paṭhanāya vā lekhanāya vā vācanāya vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:5292: tathā hy atra kauśika prajñāpāramitāyām anāsravā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:5293: yatra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śikṣitvā samyaktvanyāmam avakrāntā,
S06sspp2_4u:5295: srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca. sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:5298: pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pratyekabodhiṃ prāptāḥ prāpnuvanti prāpsyanti ca,
S06sspp2_4u:5299: bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvā bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntā avakrāmanty avakramiṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:5300: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:5301: katame ca te kauśikānāsravā dharmās tad yathā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:5326_0: sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:5328_0: anye cāparimāṇā buddhadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭāḥ. tad anenāpi te kauśika paryāyeṇaivaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:5328_1: veditavyam. yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitāṃ kṛtvā parebhyo
S06sspp2_4u:5329: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_4u:5359: akaniṣṭhā devāḥ prajñāyante. ākāśānantyāyatanā devāḥ prajñāyante,

S06sspp2_4u:6874: na dvayacaritayā buddhyā nādvayacaritayā sarvākārajñatāṃ yoniśo manasikariṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:6875_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anena paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:6875_1: parebhyo vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati prabhāvayiṣyati vivariṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:6878: na prajñāpāramitādvayeṇa draṣṭavyā na dvayena na nimittato nāyuhato nāniryūhataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:6880: na saṃkreśato na vyavadānato notpādato na nirodhataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:6881: na grahato nāgrahato nodgrahato notsargato na sthānato nāsthānato na bhūtato nābhūtataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:6882: na yogato nāyogato na śleṣmato nāśleṣmato na pratyayato nāpratyayato na dharmato nādharmataḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:6883: na tathāgatato nātathāgatato na bhūtakoṭīto nābhūtakoṭītaḥ. ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:6884: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ parebhyo vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prakāśayiṣyati vicariṣyati bhajiṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:6887: na tv eva ya ātmanaikopagṛhīyāt paryavāpnuyād ādhārayed dhārayed vācayed yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt.
S06sspp2_4u:6889_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:6889_1: paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati tāṃ ca parasmai vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati
S06sspp2_4u:6890: utttanīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati. arthaṃ cāsya upadekṣyaty ayam eva sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:6891: śakra āha: evaṃ khalu bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:6895_0: evaṃ khlu kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitopadeṣṭavyā sārthā
S06sspp2_4u:6895_1: savyañjanā. evam upadiśan punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāmānena
S06sspp2_4u:6896_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pūrvasyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:6896_1: tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān yāvaj jīvaṃ sarvasukhopadhānena satkuryān mānayet
S06sspp2_4u:6896_2: pūjayet puṣpair mālyair gandhair vilepanaiś cūrṇaiś cīvaraiś chattrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhir
S06sspp2_4u:6896_3: vividhaiś ca vādyair yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vemāṃ prajñāpāramitām
S06sspp2_4u:6896_4: anekaparyāyeṇa parasmai vistareṇa sārthaṃ savyañjanam ācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayed
S06sspp2_4u:6896_5: vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt prakāśayed ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
S06sspp2_4u:6897: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:6898_0: sacet kauśika kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśy aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ

S06sspp2_4u:6915: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhyate 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca.
S06sspp2_4u:6917: punar aparaṃ kauśika yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ carann upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:6923: yaś cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parasmai vistareṇācakṣīd deśayet prakāśayet prajñāpayet prasthāpayed vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet tac cānupalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:6924: ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06sspp2_4u:6926: dānaṃ datata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dānaṃ dadāmi idaṃ dānaṃ dadāmy asmai dānaṃ dadāmi tasyaivaṃ dānaṃ dadato dānam eva sthāsyati na dānapāramitā upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:6927: śīlaṃ rakṣata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmīdaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmi tasyaivaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣataḥ śīlam eva sthāsyati na śīlapāramitā upalabhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:6928: kṣāntiṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ kṣāntibhāvayāmīmāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06sspp2_4u:6929: tasyaivaṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayataḥ kṣāntir eva sthāsyati na kṣāntipāramitām upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:6930: vīryam ārabhamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ vīryam ārabhe asyārthāya vīryam ārabhe tasyaivaṃ vīryam ārabhamānasya vīryam eva sthāsyati na vīryapāramitā [ŚsP_II-4_184] upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:6931: dhyānāni samāpadyamānasyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ dhyānāni samāpadya imāni dhyānāni samāpadyetasyaivaṃ dhyānāni samāpadyamānasya dhyānāny eva sthāsyati na dhyānapāramitā upalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:6932: prajñāṃ bhāvayata evaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmīmāṃ bhāvayāmi tasyaivaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñaiva sthāsyati na prajñāpāramitā upalambhayogena.
S06sspp2_4u:6933_0: evaṃ khalu kauśikopalambhacaritasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā na dānapāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:6933_1: paripūryate na śīlapāramitā paripūryate na kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate na vīryapāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:6933_2: paripūryate na dhyānapāramitā paripūryate na prajñāpāramitā paripūryate.
S06sspp2_4u:6934: śakra āha: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:6935: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:6936: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:6937: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:6938: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:6939: kathaṃ carato bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā paripūryate?
S06sspp2_4u:6941: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānaṃ dadat na dāyakam upalabhate na dānaṃ pratigrāhakam upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:6942: na śīlaṃ rakṣan na śīlaṃ na śīlasamādānam upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:6943: na kṣāntiṃ bhāvayan na kṣāntiṃ rakṣanti bhāvanām upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:6944: na vīryam ārabhamāṇe na vīryāraṃbham upalabhate,
S06sspp2_4u:6947_0: evaṃ carataḥ kauśika bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā paripūryate śīlapāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:6947_1: paripūryate kṣāntipāramitā paripūryate vīryapāramitā paripūryate dhyānapāramitā paripūryate
S06sspp2_4u:6948: evaṃ khalu kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā abudhyamānasya prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanām upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:6949: evam abudhyamānasya dhyānapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:6950: evam abudhyamānasya vīryapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:6951: evam abudhyamānasya kṣāntipāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:6952: evam abudhyamānasya śīlapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā,
S06sspp2_4u:6953: evam abudhyamānasya [ŚsP_II-4_185] dānapāramitā sārthā savyañjanam upadeṣṭavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:6954: bhaviṣyanti kauśikānāgate 'dhvani kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ye bodhisattvayānikebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:6955: tatra ca kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarā yaiḥ samyaksaṃbodhir ye saṃprasthitā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:6956: te tāṃ prativarṇikāṃ śrutvā mārgāṃ praṇakṣanti teṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sārthā savyañjanā vistareṇopadiṣṭavyā.
S06sspp2_4u:6958: śakra āha: katamā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prativarṇikā?
S06sspp2_4u:6960: iha kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyāma iti,
S06sspp2_4u:6962: śakra āha: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro yā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti?
S06sspp2_4u:6964: iha kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśantaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:6967: yad uta rūpam anityam ity upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:6971: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:6979: rūpam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:6983: vedanām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:6991: vedanām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ vedanām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:6995: saṃjñām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:7001: te saṃjñām anityeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ. saṃjñāṃ duḥkheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:7002: saṃjñām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ saṃjñām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7006: saṃskārān aśubhā ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7007: ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti. yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7014: saṃskārān anātmāna iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ saṃskārān aśubhā iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7018: vijñānam aśubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7026: vijñānam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:7030: cakṣur aśubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7038: cakṣur aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7042: śrotram aśubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7045: śrotram anātmeti gaveṣiṣyante. śrotram aśubham iti [ŚsP_II-4_187] gaveṣiṣyante,
S06sspp2_4u:7049: śrotram aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7053: ghrāṇam aśubham ity upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7061: ghrāṇam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:7065: jihvām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
