S06sspp2_4u:8219: pratyekabodhim aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:8227: pratyekabodhim anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ pratyekabodhim aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8232: mārgākārajñatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:8240: mārgākārajñatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ mārgākārajñatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8245: sarvākārajñatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:8253: sarvākārajñatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti. iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā.
S06sspp2_4u:8255: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upaviśanti upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8256_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8256_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8256_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8257_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8257_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8257_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8258_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra vīryapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8258_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8258_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8259_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntipāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8259_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau [ŚsP_II-4_214] ṣaṣṭhyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8259_2: bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8260_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra śīlapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8260_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8260_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8261_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8261_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8261_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. taś ca nimittayogenopalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:8262: sa kālasaṃjñayā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayiṣyati. iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā.
S06sspp2_4u:8263: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8264_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ kulaputra prajñāīpāramitāṃ bhāvayan
S06sspp2_4u:8264_1: śrāvakabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi. iyaṃ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8265: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8266: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan bodhisattvanyāmam avakramiṣyāmy anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilapsyase,
S06sspp2_4u:8267_0: sattvam anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilabhya bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā buddhakṣetrād
S06sspp2_4u:8267_1: buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyasi tāṃ tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan
S06sspp2_4u:8267_2: mānayan pūjayan naivam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8268: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8269_0: yaḥ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
S06sspp2_4u:8269_1: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati so 'prameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8269_2: evam upadiśantas teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8270_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8270_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām
S06sspp2_4u:8270_2: arhatāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_215] samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat prathamacittotpādam upādāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:8271_0: yāvad anupādhiśeṣāṃ nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāṃ tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyānumodyānuttarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8271_1: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya evam upadiśantas te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8273: śakra āha: katham upadiśanto bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti?
S06sspp2_4u:8275_0: iha kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8275_1: caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā
S06sspp2_4u:8275_2: ca rūpam anityam iti samanupaśyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8276: rūpaṃ svabhāvaśūnyaṃ yo rūpasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhūvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā prajñāpāramitā na tatra rūpaṃ nitya iti vā anityam iti copalabhyate,
S06sspp2_4u:8277: rūpam eva na saṃvidyate nopalabhate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bbaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8278: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8279: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8280: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca vedanām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8281_0: vedanāsvabhāvena śūnyāyā vedanāyāḥ svabhāva so 'bhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8281_1: tatra na vedanā nityeti copalabhyate. vedanaiva tatra na samvidyate nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_4u:8281_2: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8282_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8282_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8282_2: bhāvaya mā ca saṃjñām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8283_0: saṃjñāsvabhāvena śūnyāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8283_1: prajñāpāramitā na tatra saṃjñā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. saṃjñaiva tatra
S06sspp2_4u:8283_2: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vābhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8283_3: te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8285_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8285_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8285_2: bhāvaya mā ca saṃskārān anityā iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8286_0: saṃskārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvā yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8286_1: prajñāpāramitā tatra na saṃskārā nityā iti vā anityā iti vopalabhyate. saṃskārā eva
S06sspp2_4u:8286_2: tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8286_3: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8287_0: punar aparaṃ. kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8287_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8287_2: bhāvaya mā ca vijñānam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8288_0: vijñānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ yo vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ so bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8288_1: prajñāpāramitā tatra na vijñānaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. vijñānam
S06sspp2_4u:8288_2: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8288_3: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8289_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8289_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8289_2: bhāvaya mā ca cakṣur anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8290_0: cakṣuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaś cakṣuṣaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8290_1: tatra na cakṣur nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. cakṣur eva tatra na saṃvidyate.

S06sspp2_4u:8291_2: bhāvaya mā ca śrotram anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8292_0: śrotraṃ svabhāvena śūnyo yaś śrotrasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8292_1: tatra na śrotraṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. śrotram eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8292_2: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ [ŚsP_II-4_217] kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8292_3: te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.

S06sspp2_4u:8293_2: bhāvaya mā ca ghrāṇam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8294_0: ghrāṇasvabhāvena śunyā yo ghrāṇasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8294_1: tatra na ghrāṇaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. ghrāṇam eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8294_2: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā
S06sspp2_4u:8294_3: vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.

S06sspp2_4u:8296_3: te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.

S06sspp2_4u:8297_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8297_2: bhāvaya mā ca kāyam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8298: kāyaḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaḥ kāyasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:8299_0: tatra na kāye nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. kāya eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8299_1: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ

S06sspp2_4u:8410_3: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8411_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8411_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8411_2: bhāvaya mā ca sparśam anitya iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8412_0: sparśasvabhāvena śūnyo yaḥ sparśasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā

S06sspp2_4u:8412_2: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8412_3: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.

S06sspp2_4u:8526_1: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra
S06sspp2_4u:8526_2: prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca srotaāpattiphalam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8527_0: srotaāpattiphalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yaḥ srotaāpattiphalasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo
S06sspp2_4u:8527_1: 'bhavaḥ sā prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na srotaāpattiphalaṃ nityam iti
S06sspp2_4u:8527_2: vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. srotaāpattiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar
S06sspp2_4u:8527_3: nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
S06sspp2_4u:8528_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputraḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayanikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8528_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8528_2: bhāvaya mā ca sakṛdāgāmiphalam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8529_0: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo
S06sspp2_4u:8529_1: 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nityam iti
S06sspp2_4u:8529_2: vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. sakṛdāgāmiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar
S06sspp2_4u:8529_3: nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
S06sspp2_4u:8530_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8530_1: kuladuhitṝṇaṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8530_2: bhāvaya mā cānagāmiphalam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8531_0: anāgāmiphalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yo 'nāgāmiphalasya svabhavaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhavaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8531_1: sā prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra nānāgāmiphalaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti
S06sspp2_4u:8531_2: vopalabhyate. anāgāmiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8531_3: vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8532_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8532_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8532_2: bhāvaya mā cārhattvam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8533_0: arhattvaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yo 'rhattvasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8533_1: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra nārhattvaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. [ŚsP_II-4_243]
S06sspp2_4u:8533_2: anāgāmiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:8534: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8535_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8535_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8535_2: bhāvaya mā ca pratyekabodhim anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8536_0: pratyekabodhiḥ svabhāvena śūnyā yaḥ pratyekabodheḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8536_1: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na pratyekabodhir nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8536_2: pratyekabodhir eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8536_3: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8537_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikanāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8537_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8537_2: bhāvaya mā ca mārgākārajñatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8538_0: mārgākārajñatā svabhāvena śūnyā yo mārgākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8538_1: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na mārgākārajñatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8538_2: mārgākārajñatā eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8538_3: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8539_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8539_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8539_2: bhāvaya mā ca sarvākārajñatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8540_0: sarvākārajñatā svabhāvena śunyā yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8540_1: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sarvākārajñatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8540_2: sarvākārajñatā eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8540_3: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8541: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayanikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8542: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca kaṃ cid dharmaṃ samatikramiṣyasi sā kvacid dharme pratiṣṭhāsyati. tat kasya [ŚsP_II-4_244] hetoh?
S06sspp2_4u:8543: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saddharmo na saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ samatikramitavyo yatra vā pratiṣṭhātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8544_0: tathā hi kauśika sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvo na śūnyā yaś ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so
S06sspp2_4u:8544_1: 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na kaścid dharma āyūhitavyo
S06sspp2_4u:8544_2: vā niryūhitavyo vā utpādayitavyo vā nirodhayitavyo vā,
S06sspp2_4u:8545_0: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
S06sspp2_4u:8545_1: upadekṣyanti. tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā
S06sspp2_4u:8545_2: artham upadeṣṭavyo evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8546: na tv eva te paurvakāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca.
S06sspp2_4u:8548: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās tān kascid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:8549: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8552: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06sspp2_4u:8553: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:8554_0: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vaded ehi
S06sspp2_4u:8554_1: tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
S06sspp2_4u:8554_2: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8555: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:8556: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvipakāḥ sattvā yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:8557: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8560: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06sspp2_4u:8561: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:8562_0: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ vadet. ehi tvaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8562_1: kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
S06sspp2_4u:8562_2: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_245] pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8563: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:8564_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:8564_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06sspp2_4u:8564_2: vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:8565: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8568: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,

S06sspp2_4u:8588_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās

S06sspp2_4u:9013: tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣipraṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyeyam iti,
S06sspp2_4u:9014: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet. imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed,
S06sspp2_4u:9015: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:9017_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvantaḥ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:9017_1: cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyaṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_4u:9017_2: tebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:9017_3: sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadised deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt
S06sspp2_4u:9017_4: saṃprakāśayet tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kṣipraṃ
S06sspp2_4u:9018: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistarenopadiśet,
S06sspp2_4u:9019: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:9020: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.

S06sspp2_4u:9021_3: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed
S06sspp2_4u:9021_4: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ cānyataro bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_4u:9021_5: mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
S06sspp2_4u:9022: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:9023: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:9024_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_4u:9024_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
S06sspp2_4u:9024_2: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva
S06sspp2_4u:9024_3: kulaputro vā kuladuhhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśet,
S06sspp2_4u:9025: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet. tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyam iti,
S06sspp2_4u:9026: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:9027: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:9029_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_4u:9029_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
S06sspp2_4u:9029_2: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06sspp2_4u:9029_3: vā imāṃ prajñāpārāmitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared
S06sspp2_4u:9029_4: vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet. tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:9029_5: ca vaded ehi kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
S06sspp2_4u:9030: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed,
S06sspp2_4u:9031: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:9032: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06sspp2_4u:9033_0: yāvantaḥ kauśika daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās
S06sspp2_4u:9033_1: te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyo bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:9034: kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ punyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:9035_0: avaivartikebhyo hi bodhisattvebhyo nānyārthaṃ dharmam upadeṣṭavyo niyatā hi te saṃbodhi
S06sspp2_4u:9035_1: parāyaṇānate bhuyo vivartittite anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbodher ayam abhū kaścic citaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:9037: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:9038: yathā yathā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttārāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyām avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:9044: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā adhyātmaśūnyatāyām avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:9062: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā smṛtyupasthāneṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:9086_0: te khalu punar bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmasaṃgrahaś cāmiṣasaṃgraheṇaṃ cānuś cānugṛhūnto
S06sspp2_4u:9086_1: bahutaraṃ te kulaputra kuladuhitaraś ca puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti. na tv eva te paurvakāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:9086_2: kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:9135: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate:
S06sspp2_4u:9136: sādhu sādhu kauśika yas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyā utsāhaṃ dadāsi bodhisattvānām ugṛhīṣve anupārayasi,
S06sspp2_4u:9137_0: evam eṣa tvayā kauśika karaṇīyaṃ ya āryaśrāvakaḥ sattvānām anugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ sa
S06sspp2_4u:9137_1: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām [ŚsP_II-4_269] anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv utsāhaṃ dadhātu
S06sspp2_4u:9137_2: dharmām iṣānugraheṇa ca bodhisattvān anugṛhātv anuparipārayatu. tat kasya hetoh?
S06sspp2_4u:9138_0: ataḥ prasabohi kauśika bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghāḥ yad uta bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:9138_1: yadi ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittan notpādayan na
S06sspp2_4u:9138_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣeta ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:9180: nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na pratyekabuddhā prajñāparan na śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:9181: yasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu danapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:9224: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaiḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu naraka ucchidyante tiryagyoni ucchidyante yamaloka ucchidyante,
S06sspp2_4u:9225: āsurāś ca kāyā parihīyante divyāṃs ca kāyā abhivartante,
S06sspp2_4u:9276: anavakāraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati prakṛtiśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:9305: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
